item.title: Skylia add a quote by Winston S. Churchill
item.description: "Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts." -- Winston S. Churchill

item.title: Skylia add a quote by Martin Luther King Jr.
item.description: "Love is the only force capable of transforming an enemy to a friend." -- Martin Luther King Jr.

item.title: Skylia add a quote by Walt Disney
item.description: "If you can dream it, you can do it. Always remember that this whole thing was started with a dream and a mouse." -- Walt Disney

item.title: Skylia add a quote by Abraham Lincoln
item.description: "The best thing about the future is that it comes one day at a time." -- Abraham Lincoln

item.title: Skylia add a quote by Eleanor Roosevelt
item.description: "No one can make you feel inferior without your consent." -- Eleanor Roosevelt

item.title: Skylia add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Be the change that you wish to see in the world." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Skylia add a quote by Helen Keller
item.description: "The best and most beautiful things in the world cannot be seen or even touched. They must be felt with the heart" -- Helen Keller

item.title: Skylia add a quote by Henry Ford
item.description: "Failure is simply an opportunity to begin again, this time more intelligently." -- Henry Ford

item.title: Skylia add a quote by George S. Patton
item.description: "If a man does his best, what else is there?" -- George S. Patton

item.title: Skylia add a quote by Albert Schweitzer
item.description: "Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success. If you love what you are doing, you will be successful." -- Albert Schweitzer

item.title: Skylia add a quote by Harry S. Truman
item.description: "It is amazing what you can accomplish if you do not care who gets the credit." -- Harry S. Truman

item.title: Skylia add a quote by Mother Teresa
item.description: "Not all of us can do great things. But we can do small things with great love." -- Mother Teresa

item.title: Skylia add a quote by Matt Groening
item.description: "Love is a snowmobile racing across the tundra and then suddenly it flips over, pinning you underneath. At night, the ice weasels come." -- Matt Groening

item.title: Skylia add a quote by Albert Camus
item.description: "Don't walk behind me; I may not lead. Don't walk in front of me; I may not follow. Just walk beside me and be my friend." -- Albert Camus

item.title: Skylia add a quote by Arthur Conan Doyle
item.description: "When you have eliminated all which is impossible, then whatever remains, however improbable, must be the truth." -- Arthur Conan Doyle

item.title: Skylia add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened." -- Dr. Seuss
